items.name: Kernel ID
items.description: Indicates the Kernel ID used by this combination

items.name: Extended Selection support flag
items.description: Indicates the support for Extended Selection of the current combination

items.name: Status Check support flag
items.description: Indicates the support for Status Check

items.name: Zero Amount Allowed support flag
items.description: Indicates the support for Zero Amount Allowed

items.name: Reader Contactless Transaction Limit
items.description: Indicates the transaction limit for a transaction to be processed over contactless interface

items.name: Reader Contactless Floor Limit
items.description: Indicates the transaction floor limit for contactless transaction

items.name: Reader Contactless CVM Required Limit
items.description: Indicates the CVM Required Limit for a transaction

items.name: Debug Trace Activation
items.description: Enable the debug traces (00: disabled; 01: enabled). This tag shall be set to disabled on real field and only enable for support purpose.

items.name: Issuer Script max size
items.description: Specifies the maximum size of Issuer Script

items.name: Visa DRL support
items.description: Indicate the support of Visa Dynamic Reader Limits (04 to enable)

items.name: EMV Clearing Tags for Kernel 2
items.description: Specifies the Clearing Data for an EMV transaction with MasterCard

items.name: Mag-stripe Clearing Tags for Kernel 2
items.description: Specifies the Clearing Data for a Mags-tripe transaction with MasterCard

items.name: EMV Clearing Tags for Kernel 3
items.description: Specifies the Clearing Data for an EMV transaction with Visa
